pages.text:
Founders Shooting Club is an exclusive gun club and firing range in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. We provide our members with a wide range of amenities and features you won’t find anywhere else. As a member, you’ll be treated like a VIP whenever you join us. Our team is committed to providing an unforgettable experience for every member. Whether you’re practicing on the firing range, working on your muscle-building plan in our health spa, or just relaxing in our lounge after a day at work, you can do so in comfort and luxury. Discover what it means to be a member at Founders Shooting Club.
VIP Membership in Founders Shooting Club
To learn about membership or to book a personal tour of the club, please use the form below to contact our Vice President of Membership, Simon George.
Address
5320 Powerline Road
Suite 120
Fort Lauderdale, FL 33309
Phone
754.241.2260
Email
sgeorge@foundersshootingclub.com
Open 24 Hours
Initiation fee:
One-time initiation fee
Dues:
Fort Lauderdale $229, Miami $249 per month
Includes:
Unlimited use of the range with no lane fees and use of the other amenities in the club.  Full reciprocity with other locations.  Please see our
FAQ page
for answers to common questions.
LIMITED-TIME PROMOTION
The first 20 VIP members that join in September will receive $1,000 off of initiation fee!
Miami Only: 500 Charter memberships will be offered.  $1,000 deposit required.  Free shooting lesson included and ask about options to use the Fort Lauderdale club until Miami opens.

Exclusive Gun Club and More in Fort Lauderdale, FL
Founders Shooting Club is being created by the owners of New England’s premier shooting club… The Weston Shooters Club. Weston Shooters Club opened in 2014 and has become the destination for shooting and socializing for our members.  Based on this concept of a “country club” atmosphere for shooting enthusiasts, we decided to replicate and build on this success by opening a new location in Fort Lauderdale.  Founders Shooting Club is Florida’s premiere private shooting club!
Contact Us
Our Exclusive Amenities
Members enjoy a private shooting range experience, in a safe, cool, and clean indoor pistol & rifle range.  The shooting range features the very latest in safety technology, including touchscreen controls, biometric security, and automated HEPA air filtration equipment.
The club will feature the following amenities:
A large member lounge
Cigar room
Table games
Boardroom for business activities and networking
Full fitness gym
Locker room with showers
Squash courts
Golf simulator
Reserved parking
On-site instructors
Biometric security
24-hour access
Newly Constructed Gun Club in Fort Lauderdale, FL
The club also features exclusive social events with guest chefs from around the world, wine & bourbon tastings, and guest speakers.
The Founders Shooting Club will not only be Florida’s premier private shooting club, but it will also be a community of family and friends who enjoy having fun, socializing, and interacting with like-minded people.

To learn about membership or to book a personal tour of the club, please use the form on the right to contact our Vice President of Membership, Simon George.

.entry__content
Creating Memories to Last a Lifetime in Fort Lauderdale, FL
At Founders Shooting Club, we believe our club is a community and our members are family. We also believe there is nothing better than socializing with family, old friends, and making new friends. To help make this happen, Founders Shooting Club hosts exclusive club events ranging from guest speakers, holiday parties, chef dinners, private tastings and cigar dinners! There will always be something going on to keep our members’ social calendar full!
We’re Committed to Giving Back to the Community
Founders Shooting Club is heavily involved in local charities, specifically, the families of law enforcement, military, and first responders. Without their brave and selfless sacrifices, we wouldn’t be able to enjoy all the activities we know and love. Their courageous acts inspire our members and us every day. We know the importance of giving back to the community we belong to and strive to uphold the values of our uniform men and women.
See Our Other Amenities

Founders Shooting club offers full state-of-the-art board facilities. Complete with a designer board table, ergonomic chairs, Zoom Rooms conferencing hardware with two TVs, wifi and charging ports.  Easily join any Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams or Webex meeting with built-in hardware.
In addition to the physical room, we can host a wide range of food and beverage options to make your meeting more comfortable. Many people choose to host a meeting and then add some fun afterwards with supervised instructive or competitive shooting for all levels from first-time shooters to experts.
A business meeting at Founders Shooting Club will be like none other, we guarantee it!
